header_text: Your boss has hired a few interns for the summer. Your boss asks you to stay after work to give them a brief presentation about the university's goals and values but tells you that this is completely optional. You feel a little nervous about giving the presentation, and you decide to stay.

elements.Text: Do you stay to give the optional presentation?
